name: Solidity Auditor
description: Smart contract security review focused on Solidity and EVM risks.

skills.name: Smart Contract Audit
skills.description: Detect common Solidity vulnerabilities and logic flaws.
examples: Audit this ERC20 contract for reentrancy or access control bugs.
Review this staking contract for logic errors.

skills.name: Gas Optimization
skills.description: Suggest gas savings and efficiency improvements.
examples: Find gas-saving refactors in this contract.
Reduce storage writes for this function.
